analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS Status: 41 (Neutral). FLAT momentum pushed the score to 41. Macro Root: DXY (Dollar strength) stability and a lower VIX (Fear index) suggest a pause in volatility. Risk Warning: High 10Y yields (4.16%) pressure stocks, but the tariff override reduces trade friction. Action: Stay neutral. Wait for VIX to drop below 15 before increasing risk exposure or transitioning to accumulation.

reports.EN: GMS Status: 41 (Neutral). FLAT momentum pushed the score to 41. Macro Root: DXY (Dollar strength) stability and a lower VIX (Fear index) suggest a pause in volatility. Risk Warning: High 10Y yields (4.16%) pressure stocks, but the tariff override reduces trade friction. Action: Stay neutral. Wait for VIX to drop below 15 before increasing risk exposure or transitioning to accumulation.

reports.ID: Status GMS: 41 (Netral). Momentum datar menjaga skor tetap di 41. Akar Makro: Stabilitas DXY (Kekuatan Dolar) dan penurunan VIX (Indeks Ketakutan) menunjukkan jeda volatilitas. Peringatan: Meski imbal hasil obligasi (4,16%) menekan pasar, pembatalan tarif memberikan kelegaan bagi perdagangan global. Kesimpulan: Tetap netral. Tunggu hingga VIX turun di bawah 15 sebelum beralih ke strategi akumulasi aset risiko tinggi.
